artifact.name: twilio.get_queue
artifact.description: Retrieve a call queue as represented by an SID

artifact.name: twilio.update_queue
artifact.description: Retrieve a call queue as represented by an SID and update its parameters

artifact.name: twilio.get_queue_list
artifact.description: Retrieve the list of queues from the specified account

artifact.name: twilio.create_queue
artifact.description: Create a new queue instance and add it to the current account's list of queues

artifact.name: twilio.get_member
artifact.description: Retrieve a member instance from a queue

artifact.name: twilio.dequeue_member
artifact.description: Dequeue a member instance from a queue

artifact.name: twilio.get_member_list
artifact.description: Retrieve a list of member instance from a queue
